channel.title: Transcription Factor on COTTON
channel.description: Recent content in Transcription Factor on COTTON

item.title: CGP1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A07G0703 Gene Symbol: CGP1a Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhAATF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A13G0332 Gene Symbol: GhAATF1 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhBES1.4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghicr24_A05G201500.1 Gene Symbol: GhBES1.4 Gene Name: BRI1-EMS-SUPPRESOR 1.

item.title: GhDREB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhDREB1 Gene Name: DREB-like transcription factor Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhDREB1 increases plant tolerance to low temperature and is negatively regulated by gibberellic acid.

item.title: GhDREB1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D12G245100 Gene Symbol: GhDREB1B Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: A copy number variant at the HPDA locus on Chromosome D12 (HPDA-D12), encoding a dehydration-responsive element-binding (DREB) transcription factor, GhDREB1B, strongly affects plant architecture in the AS98 mutant.

item.title: GhERF-IIb3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhERF-IIb3 Gene Name: cultivar Reba B50 ethylene-responsive transcription factor-IIb3 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhERF-IIb3 regulates the accumulation of jasmonate and leads to enhanced cotton resistance to blight diseas.

item.title: GhERF108
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D08G13101 Gene Symbol: GhERF108 Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor ERF108 interacts with AUXIN RESPONSE FACTORs to mediate cotton fiber secondary cell wall biosynthesis.

item.title: GhERF6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhERF6 Gene Name: ethylene response factor 6 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton Major Latex Protein 28 (GhMLP28) Functions as a Positive Regulator of the Ethylene Responsive Factor 6 (GhERF6) in Defense against Verticillium dahliae.

item.title: GhERF9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D02G1817 Gene Symbol: GhERF9 Gene Name: ethylene response factor 9 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Here, we have demonstrated that one of the ERF TFs in cotton, GhERF9, exerts a regulatory role in enhancing the expression of GhHAK5a by binding to its promoter region.

item.title: GhFSN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A12G1049 Gene Symbol: GhFSN1 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhHOX4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_Sca007830G01 Gene Symbol: GhHOX4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Phosphatidic acid interacts with an HD-ZIP transcription factor GhHOX4 to influence its function in fiber elongation of cotton.

item.title: GhJUB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhJUB1 Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Analysis demonstrated that GoPGF targets GhJUB1 to regulate gland morphogenesis.

item.title: GhKNL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhKNL1 Gene Name: KNOTTED1-LIKE Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton KNL1, encoding a class II KNOX transcription factor, is involved in regulation of fibre development.

item.title: GhMML3_A12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMML3_A12 Gene Name: MYBMIXTA-like transcription factor 3 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Small interfering RNAs from bidirectional transcripts of GhMML3_A12 regulate cotton fiber development.

item.title: GhmTERF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A13G0336 Gene Symbol: GhmTERF1 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhMYB212
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gorai.007G350500.1 Gene Symbol: GhMYB212 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 212 Genome: Phytozome v.

item.title: GhMYB24
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMYB24 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB-like protein 24 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: A Cotton Gene Encoding MYB-Like Transcription Factor (GhMYB24) is Specifically Expressed in Pollen and is Involved in Regulation of Late Anther/Pollen Development.

item.title: GhMYB25-like
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMYB25-like Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 25 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Among these transcription factors, previous studies showed that downregulation of GhMYB25-like leads to a fiberless phenotype in cotton seeds.

item.title: GhMYB36
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMYB36 Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The GhMYB36 transcription factor confers resistance to biotic and abiotic stress by enhancing PR1 gene expression in plants.

item.title: GhPAS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D12G0607 Gene Symbol: GhPAS1 Gene Name: PAGODA1 SUPPRESSOR 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The bHLH transcription factor GhPAS1 mediates BR signaling to regulate plant development and architecture in cotton.

item.title: GhRVE2A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhRVE2A Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhRVE2D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhRVE2D Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhTCE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D06G2316 Gene Symbol: GhTCE1 Gene Name: Genome: M-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhTCE1–GhTCEE1 dimers regulate transcriptional reprogramming during wound-induced callus formation in cotton Identify GhTCE1, a basic helix–loop–helix family transcription factor, and its interacting partners as a central regulatory module of early cell fate transition during in vitro dedifferentiation of cotton (Gossypium hirsutum).

item.title: GhTCP4A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_A04G0407 Gene Symbol: GhTCP4A Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhTCP4D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_D05G3657 Gene Symbol: GhTCP4D Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhTINY2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GhD06G0642 Gene Symbol: GhTINY2 Gene Name: Genome: Cotton Functional Genomics Database Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Orchestration of plant development and defense by indirect crosstalk of salicylic acid and brassinosteorid signaling via transcription factor GhTINY2.

item.title: GhVIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhVIP1 Gene Name: bZIP transcription factor 1 Genome: cotton genome (G.

item.title: GhWRKY16
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D06G0175 Gene Symbol: GhWRKY16 Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Our data demonstrate that GhWRKY16 plays a crucial role in fiber initiation and elongation, and that GhWRKY16 phosphorylation by GhMPK3-1 is essential for the transcriptional activation on downstream genes during the fiber development of cotton.

item.title: GhWRKY16-A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A06G0179 Gene Symbol: GhWRKY16-A Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhWRKY16-D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D06G0175 Gene Symbol: GhWRKY16-D Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhWRKY17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhWRKY17 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 17 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Cotton WRKY Transcription Factor GhWRKY17 Functions in Drought and Salt Stress in Transgenic Nicotiana benthamiana Through ABA Signaling and the Modulation of Reactive Oxygen Species Production.

item.title: GhWRKY70
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhWRKY70 Gene Name: Gossypium hirsutum cultivar Zhongzhimian 2 WRKY transcription factor 70 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The cotton WRKY transcription factor GhWRKY70 negatively regulates the defense response against Verticillium dahliae.

item.title: GoPGF
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A12G2172 Gene Symbol: GoPGF Gene Name: Gossypium Pigment Gland Formation Genome: NBI_Gossypium_hirsutum_v1.
